testcase.name: Login test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given Browser initialize to open............................................passed When Enter the App url......................................................passed When Click on login button from top menu....................................passed When Enter the username.....................................................passed When Enter the Passowrd.....................................................passed When Click on Sign In button below Passowrd field...........................passed When Verify to Get title of the page to make sure user login successfully...passed Then Verify the Welcome to your account msg from the main page..............passed Then Closed the browser.....................................................passed
